pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Grants the user Luck.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/imbued_jewelry)Imbued Jewelry$(),$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/totem_of_amethyst)Totem of Amethyst$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 1 $(br)$(l)Tier:$() Medium$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Other common or jewelry augments (jewelry), other common augments (totem)
